mapper.select: select rc_name, rc_date, hr_name from champion where tr_name=#{tr_name}
mapper.update: update trainers set tr_no = #{value} where tr_name = #{tr_name}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RACE_RESULT AS RRS WHERE RRS.RR_RCDATE = RS.RCDATE AND RRS.RR_RCNO = RS.RCNO AND RRS.RR_MEET = RS.MEET) AS HRCOUNT FROM( SELECT RR.RR_JKNO AS JKNO,RR.RR_JKNAME AS JKNAME,RR.RR_OWNO AS OWNO,RR.RR_OWNAME AS OWNAME,RR.RR_TRNAME AS TRNAME,RR.RR_TRNO AS TRNO, RR.RR_HRNAME AS HRNAME,RR.RR_HRNO AS HRNO,RI.RI_RCDATE AS RCDATE, RI.RI_RCNO AS RCNO, RI.RI_MEET AS MEET, RI.RI_RANK AS RANKS, RI.RI_RCDIST AS RCDIST, RI.RI_RCNAME AS RCNAME,rr.rr_ord as ord FROM RACE_INFO AS RI INNER JOIN RACE_RESULT AS RR ON RI.RI_RCDATE = RR.RR_RCDATE AND RI.RI_RCNO = RR.RR_RCNO AND RI.RI_MEET = RR.RR_MEET WHERE RR.RR_TRNO =#{tr_no}) AS RS ORDER BY RS.RCDATE DESC;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.RR_RCDATE,'%Y.%m') AS RACEMONTH, COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT, COUNT(IF(A.RR_ORD=1,A.RR_ORD,NULL)) AS ORD1COUNT, COUNT(IF(A.RR_ORD=2,A.RR_ORD,NULL)) AS ORD2COUNT, SUM( CASE WHEN A.RR_ORD=1 THEN B.RI_CHAKSUN1 WHEN A.RR_ORD=2 THEN B.RI_CHAKSUN2 WHEN A.RR_ORD=3 THEN B.RI_CHAKSUN3 WHEN A.RR_ORD=4 THEN B.RI_CHAKSUN4 WHEN A.RR_ORD=5 THEN B.RI_CHAKSUN5 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTALPRIZE FROM RACE_RESULT A INNER JOIN RACE_INFO B ON A.RR_RCDATE = B.RI_RCDATE AND A.RR_RCNO = B.RI_RCNO AND A.RR_MEET = B.RI_MEET WHERE A.RR_TRNO = #{tr_no} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(A.RR_RCDATE,'%Y%M') ORDER BY A.RR_RCDATE DESC LIMIT 6
